import React from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faExternalLinkAlt, faDownload, faCheckCircle, faRocket, faTimesCircle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Col, Row, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default () => { return ( <>

); };
